casebody.data:
Third Department,

August, 1986

(August 11, 1986) In the Matter of Delaware & Hudson Railway Co., Appellant, v Bruce J. McDonald, as Assessor of the City of Albany, Respondent. (And 75 Other Proceedings.)

— Motion for approval of statement in lieu of record denied, without costs and without prejudice to such motion being made in the court of original instance (see, CPLR 5527; 12 NYCRR 800.4 [d]). Mahoney, P. J., Main, Casey, Weiss and Harvey, JJ., concur.
